blocks.name: eubrv
blocks.content: If there is a unique set which is related to a class, then the class must be a set. (Contributed by AV, 25-Aug-2022.)

blocks.name: eubrdm
blocks.content: If there is a unique set which is related to a class, then the class is an element of the domain of the relation. (Contributed by AV, 25-Aug-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm eubrdm(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(weu(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))), wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl3anc(weu(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))), wcel(c0, cdm(c1)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cio(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))), universe), wbr(c0, c1, cio(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0)))))
  eubrv(s0, c0, c1)
  a1i(weu(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))), wcel(cio(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))), universe))
  syl(weu(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))), wbr(c0, c1, cio(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0)))), wsbc(s0, cio(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))), wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))))
  iota4(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0)))
  sylbb(wsbc(s0, cio(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))), wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))), wbr(c0, c1, cio(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0)))), wbr(csb(s0, cio(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))), c0), c1, csb(s0, cio(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))), cv(s0))))
  ax-mp(wb(wsbc(s0, cio(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))), wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))), wbr(csb(s0, cio(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))), c0), c1, csb(s0, cio(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))), cv(s0)))), wcel(cio(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))), universe))
  sbcbr12g(s0, cio(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))), universe, c0, c1, cv(s0))
  breq12i(csb(s0, cio(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))), c0), c1, csb(s0, cio(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))), cv(s0)), c0, cio(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))))
  ax-mp(wceq(csb(s0, cio(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))), c0), c0), wcel(cio(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))), universe))
  csbconstg(s0, cio(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))), universe, c0)
  csbvargi(s0, cio(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))))
  iotaex(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0)))
  breldmg(c0, universe, cio(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))), universe, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eubrdm(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (‚àÉ!(s0, c0[c1]s0)‚Üí c0 ‚àà dom(c1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl3anc(‚àÉ!(s0, c0[c1]s0), c0 ‚àà dom(c1), c0 ‚àà ùïå, iota(s0, c0[c1]s0)‚àà ùïå, c0[c1]iota(s0, c0[c1]s0))
  eubrv(s0, c0, c1)
  a1i(‚àÉ!(s0, c0[c1]s0), iota(s0, c0[c1]s0)‚àà ùïå)
  syl(‚àÉ!(s0, c0[c1]s0), c0[c1]iota(s0, c0[c1]s0), [iota(s0, c0[c1]s0)/ s0]c0[c1]s0)
  iota4(s0, c0[c1]s0)
  sylbb([iota(s0, c0[c1]s0)/ s0]c0[c1]s0, c0[c1]iota(s0, c0[c1]s0), [iota(s0, c0[c1]s0)/ s0]c0[c1][iota(s0, c0[c1]s0)/ s0]s0)
  ax-mp(([iota(s0, c0[c1]s0)/ s0]c0[c1]s0 ‚Üî[iota(s0, c0[c1]s0)/ s0]c0[c1][iota(s0, c0[c1]s0)/ s0]s0), iota(s0, c0[c1]s0)‚àà ùïå)
  sbcbr12g(s0, iota(s0, c0[c1]s0), universe, c0, c1, s0)
  breq12i([iota(s0, c0[c1]s0)/ s0]c0, c1, [iota(s0, c0[c1]s0)/ s0]s0, c0, iota(s0, c0[c1]s0))
  ax-mp([iota(s0, c0[c1]s0)/ s0]c0 = c0, iota(s0, c0[c1]s0)‚àà ùïå)
  csbconstg(s0, iota(s0, c0[c1]s0), universe, c0)
  csbvargi(s0, iota(s0, c0[c1]s0))
  iotaex(s0, c0[c1]s0)
  breldmg(c0, universe, iota(s0, c0[c1]s0), universe, c1)
}

blocks.name: eldmressn
blocks.content: Element of the domain of a restriction to a singleton. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 2-Jul-2017.)
